sentences.en: A question mark hangs over many of their futures.
sentences.cn: 他们的不少期货都还是个问号。

sentences.en: Affected, Zhengzhou is expected today or PTA futures will continue to rebound.
sentences.cn: 受其影响, 预计郑州PTA期货今日或将继续反弹.
我们经营大额存单 、 金融期货和金银块买卖.

sentences.en: Charts spanning 20 or more years are especially useful for futures traders.
sentences.cn: 对期货交易者来说,跨度在20年或20年以上的图特别有用.

sentences.en: Cotton futures are selling at high prices.
sentences.cn: 棉花期货交易的卖价是很高的.

sentences.en: Crude oil futures usually do not involve real sales of oil.
sentences.cn: 原油期货通常不包含真正的石油销售.

sentences.en: Futures contracts expire every few months, making long - term charts difficult to analyze.
sentences.cn: 期货合约在几个月后就会到期作废, 所以长线图很难分析.

sentences.en: Futures prices recovered from sharp early declines to end with moderate losses.
sentences.cn: 期货价格在早盘深幅下跌后出现反弹，收盘时未见严重损失。

sentences.en: He was making plans for the future.
sentences.cn: 他正在为将来制定计划。

sentences.en: Ounce gold futures prices fell 21 U.S. dollars . The U.
sentences.cn: 每盎司黄金期货价格下跌21美元.

sentences.en: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission imposes somewhat stricter regulations on all trading than in the past.
sentences.cn: 商品期货交易委员会对各项交易的规定较前稍微严格了一些.

sentences.en: The company trades in both actuals and futures in grain.
sentences.cn: 该公司在粮食贸易中既有现金交易也有期货交易.

sentences.en: The futures price is not constant until the contract expires.
sentences.cn: 直到其期货合约到期之前,期货价格才稳定.

sentences.en: The spokesman said no decision on the proposal was likely in the immediate future.
sentences.cn: 该发言人称近期不太可能有有关该提案的决议。

sentences.en: This report could spur some buying in corn futures when the market opens today.
sentences.cn: 这一报告可能会在今天开市后刺激一些人买进玉米期货。

sentences.en: Thousands of individuals, in contrast, trade in commodity futures as speculators.
sentences.cn: 但成千上万的个人却是做期货生意的投机商.

sentences.en: Using futures arbitrage between the spot market to obtain the excess proceeds.
sentences.cn: 用期货现货市场之间的套利获取超额收益.

phrases.tran_cn: 期货交易所；远期外汇；外汇期货

trans.tran_cn: <商>期货（交易），前途( future的名词复数 )，[美国俚语]未婚妻，期货
trans.tran_en: The future is the period of time that will come after the present, or the things that will happen then
